and aaa301 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.city}),'%')
and aab202 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.name}),'%')

SELECT count(*) FROM ab02
and aaa301 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.city}),'%')
and aab202 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.name}),'%')
SELECT aab201 as 'rid', aa03.aaa301 as 'pid', aa03.aaa302 as 'pname', aab202 as 'name', aab203 as 'routes', aab204 as 'summary' FROM ab02, aa03 WHERE aab201=#{rid} AND aa03.aaa301=ab02.aaa301;

SELECT rid, name, pic FROM (SELECT aab201 as 'rid', aab202 as 'name', aab203 as 'pic' FROM ab02 WHERE ab02.aaa301=#{cid} ) t LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(aad201) as 'count', aad203 FROM ad02 WHERE aad202=2 GROUP BY aad203) t2 ON t.rid=t2.aad203 ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT ${limit} ;
